email_body: I'm here... "Cooper, Sean" <CooperS@EPEnergy.com> on 08/29/2000 01:27:32 PM To: cc: Subject: PAB Deleted My PAB file, or for the non technical among you, my Outlook Personal Address Book was accidently deleted this week in an upgrade to Windows 2000 NT. I have restored an old one, but it is several months, if not a whole year out of date. This is the first message to confirm the current address I have for you is still active. Please reply confirming you recieved it. A second message will follow to try and replace some of the address's I know I have lost. Thanks for your help Sean. This email and any files transmitted with it from El Paso Energy Corporation are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify the sender.
